sql: SELECT places_to_watch.cartodb_id, terrestrial_grid.the_geom, terrestrial_grid.the_geom_webmercator, ST_CENTROID(terrestrial_grid.the_geom) as marker_location, places_to_watch.cell_id, places_to_watch.title,  places_to_watch.description, places_to_watch.image FROM places_to_watch INNER JOIN terrestrial_grid ON terrestrial_grid.cell_id = places_to_watch.cell_id
cartocss: #layer{ marker-file: url(https://half-earth-staging.vizzuality.com/img/icons/flag-icon.png); marker-width: 30; } #laye[zoom>3]{ marker-width: 21; } #laye[zoom>4]{ marker-width: 22; } #laye[zoom>5]{ marker-width: 24; } #layer[zoom>6]{ marker-width: 26; } #layer[zoom>7]{ marker-width: 28; } #layer[zoom>8]{ marker-width: 30; } #layer{ polygon-opacity: 0; polygon-fill: #D53369; line-width: 0; line-opacity: 0; }
